options.name: --version
tip: Show the version.

common_options.name: --authentication-oci-client-config-profile
tip: Name of the OCI profile defined in the OCI config file to use

common_options.name: --authentication-openid-connect-client-id-token-file
tip: Full path to the OpenID Connect Identity token file

common_options.name: --auto-rehash
tip: Enable automatic rehashing

common_options.name: --auto-vertical-output
tip: Enable automatic vertical result set display

common_options.name: --batch
tip: Do not use history file

common_options.name: --binary-as-hex
tip: Display binary values in hexadecimal notation

common_options.name: --binary-mode
tip: Disable \r\n - to - \n translation and treatment of \0 as end-of-query

common_options.name: --bind-address
tip: Use specified network interface to connect to MySQL Server

common_options.name: --character-sets-dir
tip: Directory where character sets are installed

common_options.name: --column-names
tip: Write column names in results

common_options.name: --column-type-info
tip: Display result set metadata

common_options.name: --commands
tip: Enable or disable processing of local mysql client commands

common_options.name: --comments
tip: Whether to retain or strip comments in statements sent to the server

common_options.name: --compress
tip: Compress all information sent between client and server

common_options.name: --compression-algorithms
tip: Permitted compression algorithms for connections to server

common_options.name: --connect-expired-password
tip: Indicate to server that client can handle expired-password sandbox mode

common_options.name: --connect-timeout
tip: Number of seconds before connection timeout

common_options.name: --database
tip: The database to use

common_options.name: --debug
tip: Write debugging log; supported only if MySQL was built with debugging support

common_options.name: --debug-check
tip: Print debugging information when program exits

common_options.name: --debug-info
tip: Print debugging information, memory, and CPU statistics when program exits

common_options.name: --default-auth
tip: Authentication plugin to use

common_options.name: --default-character-set
tip: Specify default character set

common_options.name: --defaults-extra-file
tip: Read named option file in addition to usual option files

common_options.name: --defaults-file
tip: Read only named option file

common_options.name: --defaults-group-suffix
tip: Option group suffix value

common_options.name: --delimiter
tip: Set the statement delimiter

common_options.name: --dns-srv-name
tip: Use DNS SRV lookup for host information

common_options.name: --enable-cleartext-plugin
tip: Enable cleartext authentication plugin

common_options.name: --execute
tip: Execute the statement and quit

common_options.name: --force
tip: Continue even if an SQL error occurs

common_options.name: --get-server-public-key
tip: Request RSA public key from server

common_options.name: --help
tip: Display help message and exit

common_options.name: --help
tip: Show the help.

common_options.name: --histignore
tip: Patterns specifying which statements to ignore for logging

common_options.name: --host
tip: Host on which MySQL server is located

common_options.name: --html
tip: Produce HTML output

common_options.name: --ignore-spaces
tip: Ignore spaces after function names

common_options.name: --init-command
tip: SQL statement to execute after connecting

common_options.name: --init-command-add
tip: Add an additional SQL statement to execute after connecting or re-connecting to MySQL server

common_options.name: --line-numbers
tip: Write line numbers for errors

common_options.name: --load-data-local-dir
tip: Directory for files named in LOAD DATA LOCAL statements

common_options.name: --local-infile
tip: Enable or disable for LOCAL capability for LOAD DATA

common_options.name: --login-path
tip: Read login path options from .mylogin.cnf

common_options.name: --max-allowed-packet
tip: Maximum packet length to send to or receive from server

common_options.name: --max-join-size
tip: The automatic limit for rows in a join when using --safe-updates

common_options.name: --named-commands
tip: Enable named mysql commands

common_options.name: --net-buffer-length
tip: Buffer size for TCP/IP and socket communication

common_options.name: --network-namespace
tip: Specify network namespace

common_options.name: --no-auto-rehash
tip: Disable automatic rehashing

common_options.name: --no-beep
tip: Do not beep when errors occur

common_options.name: --no-defaults
tip: Read no option files

common_options.name: --no-login-paths
tip: Do not read login paths from the login path file

common_options.name: --oci-config-file
tip: Defines an alternate location for the Oracle Cloud Infrastructure CLI configuration file.

common_options.name: --one-database
tip: Ignore statements except those for the default database named on the command line

common_options.name: --otel_bsp_max_export_batch_size
tip: See variable OTEL_BSP_MAX_EXPORT_BATCH_SIZE.

common_options.name: --otel_bsp_max_queue_size
tip: See variable OTEL_BSP_MAX_QUEUE_SIZE.

common_options.name: --otel_bsp_schedule_delay
tip: See variable OTEL_BSP_SCHEDULE_DELAY.

common_options.name: --otel_exporter_otlp_traces_certificates
tip: Not in use at this time. Reserved for future development.

common_options.name: --otel_exporter_otlp_traces_client_certificates
tip: Not in use at this time. Reserved for future development.

common_options.name: --otel_exporter_otlp_traces_client_key
tip: Not in use at this time. Reserved for future development.

common_options.name: --otel_exporter_otlp_traces_compression
tip: Compression type

common_options.name: --otel_exporter_otlp_traces_endpoint
tip: The trace export endpoint

common_options.name: --otel_exporter_otlp_traces_headers
tip: Key-value pairs to be used as headers associated with HTTP requests

common_options.name: --otel_exporter_otlp_traces_protocol
tip: The OTLP transport protocol

common_options.name: --otel_exporter_otlp_traces_timeout
tip: Time OLTP exporter waits for each batch export

common_options.name: --otel_log_level
tip: Controls which opentelemetry logs are printed in the server logs

common_options.name: --otel_resource_attributes
tip: See corresponding OpenTelemetry variable OTEL_RESOURCE_ATTRIBUTES.

common_options.name: --otel-help
tip: When enabled, prints help about telemetry_client options.

common_options.name: --otel-trace
tip: This system variable controls whether telemetry traces are collected or not.

common_options.name: --pager
tip: Use the given command for paging query output

common_options.name: --password
tip: Password to use when connecting to server

common_options.name: --password1
tip: First multifactor authentication password to use when connecting to server

common_options.name: --password2
tip: Second multifactor authentication password to use when connecting to server

common_options.name: --password3
tip: Third multifactor authentication password to use when connecting to server

common_options.name: --pipe
tip: Connect to server using named pipe (Windows only)

common_options.name: --plugin-authentication-kerberos-client-mode
tip: Permit GSSAPI pluggable authentication through the MIT Kerberos library on Windows

common_options.name: --plugin-authentication-webauthn-client-preserve-privacy
tip: Permit user to choose a key to be used for assertion

common_options.name: --plugin-authentication-webauthn-device
tip: Specifies which libfido2 device to use. Default is 0 (first device)

common_options.name: --plugin-dir
tip: Directory where plugins are installed

common_options.name: --port
tip: TCP/IP port number for connection

common_options.name: --print-defaults
tip: Print default options

common_options.name: --prompt
tip: Set the prompt to the specified format

common_options.name: --protocol
tip: Transport protocol to use

common_options.name: --quick
tip: Do not cache each query result

common_options.name: --raw
tip: Write column values without escape conversion

common_options.name: --reconnect
tip: If the connection to the server is lost, automatically try to reconnect

common_options.name: --register-factor
tip: Multifactor authentication factors for which registration must be done

common_options.name: --safe-updates,
tip: --i-am-a-dummy	Allow only UPDATE and DELETE statements that specify key values

common_options.name: --select-limit
tip: The automatic limit for SELECT statements when using --safe-updates

common_options.name: --server-public-key-path
tip: Path name to file containing RSA public key

common_options.name: --shared-memory-base-name
tip: Shared-memory name for shared-memory connections (Windows only)

common_options.name: --show-warnings
tip: Show warnings after each statement if there are any

common_options.name: --sigint-ignore
tip: Ignore SIGINT signals (typically the result of typing Control+C)

common_options.name: --silent
tip: Silent mode

common_options.name: --skip-auto-rehash
tip: Disable automatic rehashing

common_options.name: --skip-column-names
tip: Do not write column names in results

common_options.name: --skip-line-numbers
tip: Skip line numbers for errors

common_options.name: --skip-named-commands
tip: Disable named mysql commands

common_options.name: --skip-pager
tip: Disable paging

common_options.name: --skip-reconnect
tip: Disable reconnecting

common_options.name: --skip-system-command
tip: Disable system (\!) command

common_options.name: --socket
tip: Unix socket file or Windows named pipe to use

common_options.name: --ssl-ca
tip: File that contains list of trusted SSL Certificate Authorities

common_options.name: --ssl-capath
tip: Directory that contains trusted SSL Certificate Authority certificate files

common_options.name: --ssl-cert
tip: File that contains X.509 certificate

common_options.name: --ssl-cipher
tip: Permissible ciphers for connection encryption

common_options.name: --ssl-crl
tip: File that contains certificate revocation lists

common_options.name: --ssl-crlpath
tip: Directory that contains certificate revocation-list files

common_options.name: --ssl-fips-mode
tip: Whether to enable FIPS mode on client side

common_options.name: --ssl-key
tip: File that contains X.509 key

common_options.name: --ssl-mode
tip: Desired security state of connection to server

common_options.name: --ssl-session-data
tip: File that contains SSL session data

common_options.name: --ssl-session-data-continue-on-failed-reuse
tip: Whether to establish connections if session reuse fails

common_options.name: --syslog
tip: Log interactive statements to syslog

common_options.name: --system-command
tip: Enable or disable system (\!) command

common_options.name: --table
tip: Display output in tabular format

common_options.name: --tee
tip: Append a copy of output to named file

common_options.name: --telemetry_client
tip: Enables the telemetry client.

common_options.name: --tls-ciphersuites
tip: Permissible TLSv1.3 ciphersuites for encrypted connections

common_options.name: --tls-sni-servername
tip: Server name supplied by the client

common_options.name: --tls-version
tip: Permissible TLS protocols for encrypted connections

common_options.name: --unbuffered
tip: Flush the buffer after each query

common_options.name: --user
tip: MySQL user name to use when connecting to server

common_options.name: --verbose
tip: Verbose mode

common_options.name: --version
tip: Display version information and exit

common_options.name: --vertical
tip: Print query output rows vertically (one line per column value)

common_options.name: --wait
tip: If the connection cannot be established, wait and retry instead of aborting

common_options.name: --xml
tip: Produce XML output

common_options.name: --zstd-compression-level
tip: Compression level for connections to server that use zstd compression
